title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Are you tired of pesky flies buzzing around your home, barn, or business? It's time to take control with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster! Our extra-large, pre-baited adhesive traps are your first line of defense against bothersome insect infestations. Each pack contains an impressive 30 feet of our specially formulated sticky barn paper, giving you a total of 90 feet of coverage that's ready to use both indoors and outdoors.

**Features:**

- **Pre-Baited Efficiency:** No need for additional attractants. Our scented traps come pre-baited, ready to capture flies with an irresistible scent attractant formula that's effective for up to a full year.
- **Generous Coverage:** With three packs, each extending to 30 feet, and a coverage area of 3600 square inches, you're well-equipped to tackle high infestation areas across a variety of locations including residential, commercial, and industrial settings.
- **Versatile Use:** Designed for the toughest environments, it's perfect for use in barns, waste rooms, and animal farms. The green color blends seamlessly with outdoor environments.
- **Safe and Non-Toxic:** The safety of your space is paramount. Our traps are disposable, non-toxic, and an integral part of an Intelligent Pest Management approach, avoiding the need for rodenticides or snap traps in areas where they're undesirable.
- **Durability:** Field-condition tested to last in normal, damp, and humid conditions, each trap ensures long-term protection with durability that withstands various environmental challenges for up to one year.
- **Eco-Friendly Design:** When it's time for a fresh start, simply dispose of the used trap and replace it with a new one, hassle-free.

Say goodbye to ineffective pest control methods and hello to the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster. It's the smart, simple, and safe solution to reclaim your space from flying insects. Get your hands on this reliable pest management product and enjoy a fly-free environment today!

Say goodbye to pesky flies and unwanted insects with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster! This powerful and environmentally friendly solution is your go-to for effective pest control, whether you're tackling infestations at home, on the farm, or in commercial settings.
